title: Ambassador Dario Item’s Antigua.news Redefines Diplomacy
description:
Ambassador Dario Item transforms Antigua.news from an embassy channel into an independent media platform shaping global transparency and reporting.

Ambassador Dario Item of Antigua and Barbuda has taken an unconventional path in diplomacy by entering the world of independent media. Through the crea...

title: Antigua and Barbuda Calls for Just Climate Finance and Energy Transition at UNGA80
description:
Prime Minister Gaston Browne, has once again positioned the twin-island nation at the forefront of the global climate justice movement.

Addressing the 80th United Nations General Assembly, Prime Minister Browne pressed world leaders to embrace bold reforms in climate finance and a fairer global ene...
